page.title: 06Games We Like To Play. (1)
page.content: { {Poisoned Glue.} This is how you play the game Poisoned Glue. First you collect a group of five children and choose one to be The Catcher. The child who is elected to be The Catcher spreads his/her fingers out and points to the poisoned finger. The other children now catch hold of the fingers which are left. The Catcher says 'I went to the shops and bought some poisoned chocolate/cream/ beans'and so on. When The Catcher says 'I went to the shops and bought some poisoned glue' the children let go of The Catcher's fingers and run away. The Catcher runs after them and the first to be caught becomes The Catcher.
